XXadbhutdu:1: [0] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāse.
XXadbhutdu:2_0: [1] athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat.
XXadbhutdu:2_1: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe
XXadbhutdu:2_3: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasyaitad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
XXadbhutdu:2_4: īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayitvā caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ
XXadbhutdu:2_5: samyaksaṃbuddhasyāmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed
XXadbhutdu:2_6: badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
XXadbhutdu:2_7: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
XXadbhutdu:3_0: athāyuṣmata ānandasyaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:3_1: yaṇv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā me sa bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
XXadbhutdu:4_0: [2] athāyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtya paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
XXadbhutdu:4_1: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
XXadbhutdu:4_2: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt. ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam
XXadbhutdu:4_3: idam avocat. ihāhaṃ bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya
XXadbhutdu:4_4: prāvikṣaṃ. so 'ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin
XXadbhutdu:4_5: pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_6: ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
XXadbhutdu:4_7: vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
XXadbhutdu:4_8: parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim
XXadbhutdu:4_9: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_10: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
XXadbhutdu:5: tasya mamaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ. yanv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
XXadbhutdu:7_0: idam avocat. sādhu sādhv ānanda bahujanahitāya tvam ānanda pratipanno ca bahujanasukhāya
XXadbhutdu:7_1: lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam evārthaṃ
XXadbhutdu:7_2: paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. tena hy ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru,
XXadbhutdu:8_0: bhāṣiṣye. jambūdvīpo hy ānanda dvīpaḥ saptayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa uttaraviśālo
XXadbhutdu:8_1: dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
XXadbhutdu:8_3: vā bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet. yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya
XXadbhutdu:8_4: mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ vā yaṣṭim āropayet
XXadbhutdu:8_5: badarīpatramātracchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
XXadbhutdu:9: idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:10_0: [4] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda pūrvavideho nāma dvīpo 'ṣṭauyojanasahasrāṇy
XXadbhutdu:10_1: āyāmavistāreṇa samantād ardhacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścit śrāddhaḥ kulaputro
XXadbhutdu:10_2: vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ
XXadbhutdu:10_3: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
XXadbhutdu:10_4: sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ
XXadbhutdu:10_5: kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:11_0: [5] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānandāvaragodānīyo nāma dvīpo navayojanasahasrāṇy

XXadbhutdu:14_0: [8] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo

XXadbhutdu:15_0: [9] tat kasya hetoḥ. aprameyo hy ānanda tathāgato dānenāprameyaḥ śīlenāprameyaḥ kṣāntyāprameyo
XXadbhutdu:15_1: vīryeṇāprameyo tyāgenāprameyo maitryāprameyaḥ karuṇayāprameyo muditayāprameya upekṣayā
XXadbhutdu:15_2: caturbhir vaiśāradyais daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
XXadbhutdu:16: [10] evam ukto āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXadbhutdu:17_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ. ko nāmāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:17_1: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adbhutam adbhutadharmaparyāyaṃ
XXadbhutdu:17_2: iti dhāraya. idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te bhikṣava āyuṣmāṃś cānando bhagavato
